text_size=”h3″]Protect[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]Most major UGC platforms have adopted Audible Magic to identify and protect copyright content! We’ve already helped identified or block more than 300 million UGC files per month with unauthorized music, movies, or television content.

Registration is free of charge to rights holders.[/vc_column_text][vc_button button_color=”accent” size=”btn-lg” radius=”btn-circle” hover_fx=”full-colored” border_width=”0″
